verses.verse: Now after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> it came to pass,<WH1961> that the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> Moses'<WH4872> minister,<WH8334> saying,<WH559>

Moses <WH4872> my servant<WH5650> is dead;<WH4191> now<WH6258> therefore arise,<WH6965> go over<WH5674> <WH853> this<WH2088> Jordan,<WH3383> thou,<WH859> and all<WH3605> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I<WH595> do give<WH5414> to them, even to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
Every <WH3605> place<WH4725> that<WH834> the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> shall tread<WH1869> upon, that have I given<WH5414> unto you, as<WH834> I said<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses.<WH4872>

From the wilderness<WH4480> <WH4057> and this<WH2088> Lebanon<WH3844> even unto<WH5704> the great<WH1419> river,<WH5104> the river<WH5104> Euphrates,<WH6578> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of the Hittites,<WH2850> and unto<WH5704> the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> toward the going down<WH3996> of the sun,<WH8121> shall be<WH1961> your coast.<WH1366>

There shall not<WH3808> any man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> thee all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of thy life:<WH2416> as<WH834> I was<WH1961> with<WH5973> Moses,<WH4872> so I will be<WH1961> with<WH5973> thee: I will not<WH3808> fail<WH7503> thee, nor<WH3808> forsake<WH5800> thee.

Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage:<WH553> for<WH3588> unto<WH853> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> shalt thou<WH859> divide for an inheritance<WH5157> <WH853> the land,<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them.

Only <WH7535> be thou strong<WH2388> and very<WH3966> courageous,<WH553> that thou mayest observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> the law,<WH8451> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650> commanded<WH6680> thee: turn<WH5493> not<WH408> from<WH4480> it to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left,<WH8040> that<WH4616> thou mayest prosper<WH7919> whithersoever<WH3605> <WH834> thou goest.<WH1980>

This <WH2088> book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> shall not<WH3808> depart<WH4185> out of thy mouth;<WH4480> <WH6310> but thou shalt meditate<WH1897> therein day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> that<WH4616> thou mayest observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that is written<WH3789> therein: for<WH3588> then<WH227> thou shalt make<WH6743> <WH853> thy way<WH1870> prosperous,<WH6743> and then<WH227> thou shalt have good success.<WH7919>

Have not<WH3808> I commanded<WH6680> thee? Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage;<WH553> be not afraid,<WH6206> <WH408> neither<WH408> be thou dismayed:<WH2865> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is with<WH5973> thee whithersoever<WH3605> <WH834> thou goest.<WH1980>
Then Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> the officers<WH7860> of the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>

Pass <WH5674> through<WH7130> the host,<WH4264> and command<WH6680> <WH853> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Prepare<WH3559> you victuals;<WH6720> for<WH3588> within<WH5750> three<WH7969> days<WH3117> ye<WH859> shall pass over<WH5674> <WH853> this<WH2088> Jordan,<WH3383> to go in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> <WH853> the land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> you to possess<WH3423> it.
And to the Reubenites,<WH7206> and to the Gadites,<WH1425> and to half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> spoke<WH559> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559>

Remember <WH2142> <WH853> the word<WH1697> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> you, saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given you rest,<WH5117> and hath given<WH5414> you<WH853> this<WH2063> land.<WH776>

Your wives,<WH802> your little ones,<WH2945> and your cattle,<WH4735> shall remain<WH3427> in the land<WH776> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan;<WH3383> but ye<WH859> shall pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> your brethren<WH251> armed,<WH2571> all<WH3605> the mighty men<WH1368> of valor,<WH2428> and help<WH5826> them;

Until <WH5704> <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> have given<WH5117> your brethren<WH251> rest,<WH5117> as he hath given you, and they<WH1992> also<WH1571> have possessed<WH3423> <WH853> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> them: then ye shall return<WH7725> unto the land<WH776> of your possession,<WH3425> and enjoy<WH3423> it, which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the LORD's<WH3068> servant<WH5650> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrising.<WH4217> <WH8121>

And they answered<WH6030> <WH853> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> All<WH3605> that<WH834> thou commandest<WH6680> us we will do,<WH6213> and whithersoever<WH413> <WH3605> <WH834> thou sendest<WH7971> us, we will go.<WH1980>

According as we hearkened<WH8085> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> in all<WH3605> things,<WH834> so<WH3651> will we hearken<WH8085> unto<WH413> thee: only<WH7535> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> be<WH1961> with<WH5973> thee, as<WH834> he was<WH1961> with<WH5973> Moses.<WH4872>

Whosoever <WH3605> <WH376> <WH834> he be that doth rebel against<WH4784> <WH853> thy commandment,<WH6310> and will not<WH3808> hearken unto<WH8085> <WH853> thy words<WH1697> in all<WH3605> that<WH834> thou commandest<WH6680> him, he shall be put to death:<WH4191> only<WH7535> be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage.<WH553>
